requestBody.description: Represents the model containing an authorization code used to unlock a feature in machines and EDT

Code.description: The code to enter to unlock a feature. Read only.

CreatedByUserID.description: The ID of the user that created this authorization code. Read only.

CreatedDate.description: A timestamp of when this code was created. Read only.

DataParameters.description: The parameters and values contained as data in this authorization code. May not be updated.

items.description: A parameter used to create an authorization code.

Name.description: The name of the parameter. May not be updated.

Value.description: The value of the parameter. May not be updated.

DefinitionID.description: The id of the definition for this authorization code. May not be updated.

DeletedByUserID.description: The ID of the user that deleted this authorization code. Read only.

DeletedDate.description: A timestamp of when this authorization code was deleted. Read only.

ID.description: The identifier for the authorization code. Read only.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether this code is deleted.

ValidationParameters.description: The parameters and values used to validate this authorization code. May not be updated.

items.description: A parameter used to create an authorization code.

Name.description: The name of the parameter. May not be updated.

Value.description: The value of the parameter. May not be updated.
